nars.util.event

Class NARReaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • nars.util.event.AbstractReaction<java.lang.Class,java.lang.Object[]>
      • nars.util.event.NARReaction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Reaction<java.lang.Class,java.lang.Object[]>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BeliefPrediction

    public abstract class NARReaction
extends AbstractReaction<java.lang.Class,java.lang.Object[]>
    Class whch manages the registration and unregistration of event handlers with an EventEmitter. it may be enabled and disabled repeatedly with different event classes as selector keys for event bus messages.
